carousel.des_1: My name is Huy! Welcome to My World!
carousel.des_2: If you have some time, let's explore a part of my life with many interesting things together

home.music_title: Tran Van Huy - Huy's Music (Official Video)
home.about_me_des: Hi everybody! I am Huy, the person behind the words here. Welcome to my small world!
home.footer_thanks_content: Huy would like to send everyone, including family, friends, relatives and people Huy has never met, a sincere thank you for spending a small part of your time to explore a small part of the world. Huy's world.
home.footer_thanks_contact: People who want to know more about Huy can search through Huy's Social Network pages.

badminton_content.head: You can watch more videos about badminton
badminton_content.foot: ! Once again, thank you for taking some time to look back with me on this journey!
